item.content:encoded:
HTML

Html is a language for building web site, basically it is the back bone of the web site without it the web simply wont work. The way HTML work is just like a lose sandwich if you start with a bread you need to stop with a bread too. Html tag can be combine together to create something, and the way tag work to together is by working under each other. Below is the list of HTML tags:

CSS

CSS is similar to HTML they both are use in web site, however CSS is like the outside skin over the HTML. CSS are use as a style for the Web page while HTML provide the text and functionality, CSS provide the color, style, positioning, and the effect for the webpage. CSS work as you look on a element target a part of the HTML and then you use the code to change the target to be what ever you want.
